Isabella Rodriguez.description: serving customers at Hobbs Cafe (taking customer orders) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cafe customer seating

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about two classmates, Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller, making plans to meet at the library to go over their research papers together after finishing up their individual projects. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus! I saw you working on your research paper in the library earlier. How's it going?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria! It's going well, just finishing up the introduction section. How about you, how's your research paper coming along?
Maria Lopez
That's great to hear! I'm almost done with mine too. Do you want to meet up tomorrow morning at the library to go over our papers together?
Klaus Mueller
That sounds like a plan! Let's meet at 9 am at the library tomorrow.
Maria Lopez
Great, I'll grab breakfast at Hobbs Cafe at 8 am and then head to the library. See you then!
Klaus Mueller
Sounds good, I'll see you at the library at 9 am. Have a great evening!
